wikipedia_page.main: Diana Thomas (formerly David Thomas; born 17 January 1959), better known by the pen name Tom Cain, is an English journalist and author of a series of thriller novels about protagonist Samuel Carver.

response: * David Thomas (born 1959), English author, better known under his pen name Tom Cain

link_mentions.page: Theakston's Old Peculier Crime Novel of the Year Award

response: The Accident Man is the first novel of the Samuel Carver series by English thriller writer, Tom Cain, released on 2 July 2007 through Bantam Press.

The Survivor is the second novel of the Samuel Carver series by English thriller writer, Tom Cain, released on 7 July 2008 through Bantam Press. The novel was (somewhat paradoxically) released under the title No Survivors to the American audience.
Assassin is the third novel of the Samuel Carver series by English thriller writer, Tom Cain, released on 2 July 2009 through Bantam Press.
Dictator is the fourth novel of the Samuel Carver series by English thriller writer, Tom Cain, released on 5 August 2010 through Bantam Press.
Carver is the fifth novel of the Samuel Carver series by English thriller writer, Tom Cain, released on 18 August 2011 through Bantam Press.
* Tom Cain (1959), English journalist and author
Predator is a novel spy thriller 2016  by Wilbur Smith and Tom Cain. It was the second Smith novel done with a co-writer.
